name: alfu32.vsvg
description:
SVG rendering context
web - Canvas like rendering context 2d

What's working:

(poly)lines (begin(),stroke(),fill(),line_to,arc_to)
rectangle
ellipse
stroke_text
fill_text
context save and restore
context transforms (translate, rotate, scale)
context parameters:
fill_style
stroke_style
line_cap
line_dash_offset
line_join
line_width
miter_limit
direction
font
font_kerning
text_align
text_baseline
line_dash

Examples
for now see the file rendering_context_test.v
